fields.name: Unlisted:
fields.value: Target anyone that placed lower than you last evening. Make any investigations about their actions tonight fail.

fields.name: Matchup (1x, 100%):
fields.value: Use during day. Target two players. Whichever player places higher this evening will appear to have visited the lower during investigations tonight.

fields.name: YOU D  I E (Passive):
fields.value: Your vote is the tierbreaker, with greater priority than abstains. If another “tiebreaker” is present, better evening score from last evening breaks the tie.
